content.label: Principle investigator
content.description: Please specify the person / laboratory responsible for the data acquisition.

content.description: Please specify the institution where the data was acquired.

content.description: To whom correspondence should be addressed?

content.label: Is the workflow targeted or untargeted?
Clinical
content.description: Is it clinical lipidomics, i.e. samples were analyzed related to a clinical question using a quantitative, validated method?

content.description: Which type of lipid extraction was applied?

content.description: Which other extraction method was applied?

content.description: Was the pH adjusted for extraction? If yes, which buffer, acid/base was added?

content.description: Type of 1-phase, i.e. organic solvent used for protein precipitation.

content.description: Which other type 1-phase was used for protein precipitation?

content.description: Type of 2-phase; for other include reference when available.

content.description: Which other type 2-phase was used?

content.description: Separation mode applied for SPE.

content.description: Which other solid-phase extraction was applied?

content.label: Were internal standards added prior extraction?
